thread.title: Greens Pledge to Make Poverty History, At Home and Abroad (Green Party of Canada)

author: wn.com
title: Greens Pledge to Make Poverty History, At Home and Abroad (Green Party of Canada)
text: ( Source : Green Party of Canada ) (VICTORIA) -Elizabeth May, leader of the Green Party of Canada ( Saanich-Gulf Islands ), and Jo-Ann Roberts , Green Party candidate ( Victoria ), committed to address poverty in the Capital Region and on Vancouver
